name: Chaos Dynasty Honey
storyline: On what would have been another rather uneventful morning in the Chaos Dynasty's hidden castle, Honey the Cat is awoken by a sudden invasion from an unknown robot army that appears to have stolen the Master Shard, an unstable piece of the Master Emerald her family was tasked to protect long ago. Seeing as everyone else went on vacation a week prior to the game's events, it is now solely up to Honey, who gladly uses the opportunity to advertise and develop her new Armored clothing line, to travel the lands and retrieve the shard from these mysterious invaders.
